channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Land and Sea
channel.desc: Newfoundland and Labrador's spectacular rock isn't just something to be photographed; for many, jagged cliffs and banks of boulders are meant to be gripped and scaled; they are rock climbers.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: CBC Arts: Exhibitionists
channel.desc: A photographer photographs ballet dancers; a make-up artist takes on Picasso; actor and director Sarah Gadon discusses her inspiration.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Kayak to Klemtu
channel.desc: A 14-year-old girl readies for a kayak trip along the shores of the Great Bear rainforest with her family to protest oil tanker traffic.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Grand Designs Australia
channel.desc: Dennis and Karen have long dreamed of living in the wilderness and in 2013 they finally bought their perfect bush block in Clarence, a tiny pocket of the spectacular Blue Mountains, west of Sydney.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: The Great British Baking Show
channel.desc: The chefs hope to score points with gooey brownies, get twisted over chocolate babkas and beat the heat with white chocolate-tiered celebration cakes.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Dragons' Den
channel.desc: Two friends look for an investment in their sustainable product; an entrepreneur marches to the beat of his own drum; a new product in the gaming world; one entrepreneur hopes that a rotten smell will yield some sweet investments.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Heartland
channel.desc: An accident puts Shane's wedding in jeopardy; Nathan tries to make amends with Amy while helping his traumatized horse; Heartland Beef faces an uncertain future; Katie finds a new side of herself.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Junior Baking Show
channel.desc: The first heat of 8 junior bakers enter the tent for two baking challenges; Liam tests the bakers in a tricky cartoon Technical Challenge where they must turn a 3D cake into a 2D comic delight.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Junior Baking Show
channel.desc: Rav asks the bakers to create monstrously creative cookies, and for the Showstopper, the bakers are tasked with showcasing what they think is the world's greatest invention, in biscuit form.

channel.title: The National
channel.desc: CBC's flagship nightly news program, featuring the day's top stories with in-depth and original journalism; Adrienne Arsenault and Ian Hanomansing anchor.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: CBC Vancouver News
channel.desc: The latest news and weather.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Still Standing
channel.desc: The largest M?tis community in North America, St. Laurent, has struggled with a flood and rural decline; but after much rebuilding, the spotlight is finally shining on this town in a whole new way.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: The Grizzlies
channel.desc: Lacrosse transforms the lives of Inuit students when they learn how to play the game.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Toonik Tyme
channel.desc: Hosts Pauline Pemik and Meghan Roberts look at the history of Toonik Tyme, Nunavut's longest running festival.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Still Standing
channel.desc: Oneida Nation of the Thames is hard at work reclaiming the economic, cultural and spiritual practices that were banned by government policies over the past 100 years.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Still Standing
channel.desc: M'Chigeeng First Nation on Manitoulin Island was once the center for the Anishinaabe people; this changed dramatically when a series of treaties cut off the community from their traditional lands.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Still Standing
channel.desc: The forced relocation of the Membertou First Nation 100 years ago sent the community into crisis; thanks to a bold economic plan, they have successfully pulled off a stunning transformation.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Escape to the Country
channel.desc: Three generations of one family want to move to the East Midlands; the task of finding a new home for them all has fallen on Mum, Grandma and Ginny Buckley; Ginny meets a volunteer group helping to restore the area's local canals.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Escape to the Country
channel.desc: Having fallen head over heels with North Yorkshire, a retired teacher and her pet bunny Gary need Nicki Chapman's help to find a new home to let them fully enjoy the surrounding countryside.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: World Report
channel.desc: What's going on in Canada and the world; a ten-minute dose of big news stories.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: The Early Edition
channel.desc: The latest Vancouver news, traffic, culture and quirks.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Mini-Jon and Mini-Maple
channel.desc: Shorthands is infected with a bizarre disease invented by the mini-clones: canine hiccups; all they have left to do is to invent the cure.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Super Agent Jon Le Bon!
channel.desc: One of Q's experiments sends Jon straight into an opposite dimension, where the Agency is evil.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Super Agent Jon Le Bon!
channel.desc: Jon's mission is to steal the missile launch codes held by Tiberius at a gala; in order to thwart the president's plans, he must repeat every word that Maple whispers to him.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Super Agent Jon Le Bon!
channel.desc: Jon and Maple are having an epic picnic on the roof of the Agency while Whitewash is trying to blow up the sun.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Kingdom Force
channel.desc: The Wolf and Bear communities argue over ownership of the new bridge that connects their two villages.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Dino Ranch
channel.desc: When Miguel tries to teach Ogie how to fly a pterosaur, he keeps changing his lesson plan every time Ogie fails, not realizing that Ogie learns through "trial by error.".

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: PAW Patrol

channel.title: Big Blue
